name: optimesh
description: OptiMesh reduces meshes resolution to optimize performance, memory usage and download size

scripts.prepublish: (git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || (echo "There are uncommitted changes"; && exit;)) && node --experimental-modules publish.mjs
scripts.postpublish: git add package.json && git commit -m "bump and publish %npm_package_version%" && git push

author: DVLP
